reuters.title: AMERICAN MICRO SIGNS THREE-YEAR SERVICE PACT
reuters.body:
<American Micro Technology Co> said it signed a three-year installation and service agreement with TRW Inc <TRW>. Under the agreement, TRW initially will provide on-site installation and service of AMT's full line of PC compatible products in a 100-mile radius of 12 major cities, which represent more than two-thirds of the PC market, American Micro said. The company said the pact allows it to pursue government bids which require installation and service support.
